p: Phosphate buffer (50 mM, pH 7.8) was used for plants extraction. 0.15 g of each sample was subjected in 1 mL phosphate buffer to ground. Further the mixture was centrifuged at 14,000×g (20 min, 4ºC). Now the supernatant of this extracted plant material used to perform further phytochemical activities. All the data were taken in replicates of three.
